title: Question about Ranked
body:
Hi.
I'm new to the whole ranking system but just wondering if someone could help me answer this. 
If you finish this season as Silver, when the new season starts do you automatically get the border or do you have to finish your placements first to obtain it?

replies.body:
you automatically get it.

If you don't like it, I heard you can send in a support ticket and ask for it to be removed.

you have to finish your placements (which places you in the rank suited to you)

If you finish bronze you pretty much get nothing but an icon
Silver+ you get the border 
Gold + you get Victorious Skin aswell 

i would play your 10 placement games ASAP as the season ends soon even if you get low rank still get an icon #worth

If you finish the season in silver then you'll get the silver border and summoner icon. To be ranked in the new season you will have to complete 10 more provisional matches when the new season starts to see where you'll be placed
